widgets_values:
# AF - Edit Generated Prompt Node ### This is a very simple setup using my Edit Prompt Node The "Symbolic Node For Your LLM Setup" node here is symbolic for the LLM setup you might be running. I strongly suggest that you watch the tutorial by [Pixaroma](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eK6MXm7q37c), which explains in detail how to setup an LLM using Ollama in your workflows.
--- ### What it does and how it works The basic concept is to plug an LLM connection to the input of the **AF - Edit Generated Prompt** node. Then you can either: - Pass on the prompt unedited
- Click the **Copy Generated Prompt for Editing** button, which will copy the received prompt to the lower field in the node, where you can edit it.
**NOTE**: If the editable field is empty, the unedited prompt will be passed on. --- ### Github Link to the node Get the node [here](https://github.com/alFrame/ComfyUI-AF-Pack-Prompt-Nodes) Report issues [here](https://github.com/alFrame/ComfyUI-AF-Pack-Prompt-Nodes/issues)

nodes.title: Symbolic Node For Your LLM Setup
widgets_values: This Here symbolizes your Ollama, or any other LLM input source.
